main.title: front-end
main.subtitle: developer
main.paragraph1: I am a frontend developer with a background in linguistics who transitioned from human languages to programming languages. With English and French in my toolkit, I connect with people from all over the world and use these skills to keep learning — including in coding.
main.paragraph2: After gaining solid experience in tech support, I learned programming on real-world problems and keep improving by building new projects.
main.paragraph3: My current stack includes JavaScript, TypeScript, React, and Next.js.
main.paragraph4: I'm passionate about the topics of women's health and well-being and hope to join a femtech project someday.

carrotQuest.name: Carrot quest - Marketing Platform
carrotQuest.description: As part of Carrot quest team, I migrated the company website from Gatsby to Next.js to improve performance and unify codebases. I introduced TypeScript, ESLint, reusable UI components, and built interactive features like quizzes, pop-ups, banners, and video widgets.

stellarBurgers.name: Stellar Burgers online shop
stellarBurgers.description: An online store for hamburgers with an order constructor, authorization, and WEB sockets for the confirmation of the order status is being used as a training project by Yandex courses. The goal of the project was to practice hard-skills and main technologies stack.

welderCatherine.name: The Welder Catherine - Coffee Producer
welderCatherine.description: I independently wrote or translated blog texts and built the layout using HTML and CSS directly on the website powered by Bitrix.

heado.name: HEADO - Digital Assistant for Retail Stores
heado.description: I created responsive HTML emails based on Figma designs with pixel-perfect layout and cross-client compatibility. All templates were tested and optimized for major email clients like Gmail and Mail.ru, ensuring consistent user experience and clear communication.

tomas.name: Tomas Bata University in Zlín
tomas.description: Exchange programme - English for Business Administration

contactsSection.description: Let's build something meaningful together — feel free to reach out, the best part might just be ahead.
